project.description: Check for new stemcell versions, and trigger a CF deployment if a new one is found

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
STEMCELL_BASE_URL=<%= @vars['stemcell_base_url'] %> STEMCELL_SEARCH=<%= @vars['stemcell'] %> STEMCELL_DATA=`curl "${STEMCELL_BASE_URL}/?prefix=${STEMCELL_SEARCH}" 2>/dev/null` STEMCELL_DATE_ADDED=`echo $STEMCELL_DATA | sed 's/.*<LastModified>\([^<]*\)<\/LastModified>.*/\1/' | tr -d ' '` STEMCELL_URL=${STEMCELL_BASE_URL}/${STEMCELL_SEARCH} STEMCELL_TMP_DIR=${WORKSPACE}/stemcell
mkdir -p $STEMCELL_TMP_DIR <% if @vars['http_proxy'] %>http_proxy=<%= @vars['http_proxy'] %><% end %> wget $STEMCELL_URL -O stemcell.tgz tar -zxvf stemcell.tgz -C $STEMCELL_TMP_DIR
RUBY_SCRIPT="data = YAML::load(STDIN.read); puts \"#{data['name']} #{data['version']}\"" STEMCELL_PROPS=`cat ${STEMCELL_TMP_DIR}/stemcell.MF | ruby -ryaml -e "$RUBY_SCRIPT"`
cd $WORKSPACE echo $STEMCELL_DATE_ADDED > stemcell_date_added.txt echo $STEMCELL_PROPS > stemcell_version.txt
